posts.title: Helen Keller
posts.author: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

posts.title: Les Brown
posts.author: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.

posts.title: Stephen Richards
posts.author: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.

posts.title: Elbert Hubbard
posts.author: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.

posts.title: Mary Lou Retton
posts.author: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive good things and good people will be drawn to you.
